website_summaries.verdict: Perfect bench for outdoor environments like front or backyards. Simple and sturdy.
pros: Great construction and use of materials
Will survive harsh weather without warping or chipping
cons: Can damage carpet and hardwood indoors

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bench!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece. Very sturdy - I have stood on this with my boyfriend to hang a painting and it didn't wobble or creak. While I would love to be able to afford a real Nelson bench this price couldn't be beat! Classic, timeless design - hoping to enjoy this piece for many years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: A COMPLETE WINNER! One of the top 3 products I have ever ordered on-line - among hundreds!
customer_reviews.text: I am stunned by how exceptional this bench/table is! The photos do not come close to how beautiful, sleek, and well-made it is in real life. I am so happy with it, in fact, that I just ordered another one to take the place of our living room coffee table - it's the perfect size, shape and color for the space. Thank you very much to the talented and creative people who have designed such a lovely and multi-functional piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hammer

customer_reviews.title: If you are thinking about it just do it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been thinking about this thing for years, and FINALLY but the bullet and went with it, and no regrets here! its so nice, very well built and easy to assemble, looks like a million bucks, adds character to the room without breaking the bank too much! I have gone through a few this past few months trying to find the perfect one , I should have just got this as soon as I laid eyes on it.
customer_reviews.author: shan

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this--so classy looking a sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this--so classy looking a sturdy. I bought it for my business and immediately ordered a second one, we loved it so much. There is some issue of the bench tipping if someone sits on the edge. Although no one ever fell on the ground or anything, there were a few close calls, so we ended up moving the legs further out to the edge and that fixed the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time to return this bench
customer_reviews.text: The first bench we ordered in "Walnut" was definitely not walnut colored, and was way darker than the description. It was more like "espresso" finish. The second bench in "Natural" looked to be in pretty good shape, but when we went to assemble it the screw holes in the bench did not line up with the holes in the legs. We tried every direction - it's going back. And now backordered until December? I don't think it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Marine Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Looks great and exactly as shown in picture. The wood is sturdy, heavy, and appears to be of quality materials. I wanted this look for my room for the bench next to my bed, but given that I would rarely sit on it for too long, I did not want to spend too much money for the bench. This was a very good compromise on price and aesthetics. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: My Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Love this bench!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bench. Looks amazing and feels very sturdy, though it IS a bit low to the ground. This is plain to see if you look at the measurements, but nevertheless, it FEELS even lower.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Stunning bench!
customer_reviews.text: I had this bench in my cart for months. Then, it went out of stock and a few negative reviews popped up. But, I decided to buy it once it came back in stock. It arrived well packed. It was super easy to put together. And, it is GORGEOUS! I regret that I waited so long to pull the trigger.
customer_reviews.author: SPensa

customer_reviews.title: Great aside from the packaging
customer_reviews.text: The package was slightly damaged and unfortunately so was the bench (see photos). We decided to not go through the hassle of returning it, cut or sand the rougher parts, and put it together anyway. We have it at the bottom of our bed. It looks really nice, feels sturdy, and fits nicely with our other furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel EM

customer_reviews.title: Great product, good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This bench is great. It was delivered undamaged and in good condition. The assembly was a breeze...just 8 screws which come with a simple tightening devise. A real sharp, clean design, that blends nicely with my modern living room furniture. It's cool that you can see through the top. The four foot width is the perfect size for my living room. I made/use the bench into a coffee table. It's very sturdy if you want to sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, great looks
customer_reviews.text: So easy to assemble that I did it by myself in about 10 minutes. It looks fantastic and seems very well made. The only caveat is to be careful about sitting on the extreme ends if nobody's already sitting in the middle, because it'll tip!
customer_reviews.author: Papaya Girl

customer_reviews.title: Go for it.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy piece of forniture. Fast delivery and the product came in perfect condition, nicely packed and properly protected on the edges. Pretty easy to assemble. Would definitely recommend this item, if you're looking for an affordable version of the Nelson masterpiece.
customer_reviews.author: VA

customer_reviews.title: One year use - paint coming off - poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It looked great upon arrival but I've now owned this for a year and the paint is chipping off on the corners. I treat my furniture gently; this bench is made of plywood that's been painted walnut color. I've been using it as a coffee table in my living room (no direct sun exposure). What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Kate

customer_reviews.title: A few small imperfections but overall great quality
customer_reviews.text: found a few small imperfections in the wood but the overall quality is great. This bench works wonderfully is a modern coffee table. Assembly was super easy and it is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Tom E Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Good, but assembling the bench was not trivial
customer_reviews.text: Great bench, arrived well packaged and in perfect condition. I'm taking out one star for just one reason: the assembling holes did not align correctly between the legs and the bench board. I had to use force to align them so I could attach the screws. Connecting legs to a bench was supposed to be trivial, but not in this case.
customer_reviews.author: Ademar Reis

customer_reviews.title: Item severely damaged
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this bench, the listing said that it would come in a damaged box and without hardware (at a discounted price), but was in otherwise good condition. When I received the item and opened the box, it looked like it in fact had some kind of huge acid burns across the top face of the bench. I was ordering the bench for a dinner party that I was hosting, and since I now have to return it, in the end I didn’t even have enough seating for all my guests. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and looks great
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this to make a makeshift mudroom. The holes on the bench bottom for the legs are all re-enforced with metal fittings. GREAT quality and reasonably priced, I'm so happy with how this looks. We actually ordered custom legs to make it taller so we could fit a shoe rack underneath as it was too short for our rack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bench. The walnut color is outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bench. The walnut color is outstanding. Simple and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Large roomy well made bench
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Large. Perfect for our entry. Has stood up to kids climbing and adults resting with style and grace. We've had it for about 60 days. If anything changes, I will let you all know!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Surprising quality, looks great.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleasantly surprised by the quality of this reproduction Nelson bench. The "natural" colorway is, in fact, unfinished, solid wood. It's also less than 1/10 the price of an original. It looks great!
customer_reviews.author: thedishesaredoneman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy: leg holes don’t match the seat at all
customer_reviews.text: The holes drilled in the legs are in an opposite pattern to that needed for alignment with the bench seat. It’s so bad that we are laughing. We ended up aligning some holes just enough to attach the legs, but of course the legs are on side-ways now. The only solution is to drill additional holes in the bench or the legs. Don’t purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: TUD

customer_reviews.title: Best deal on a bench/table of this design.
customer_reviews.text: I recently saw an original version of this bench/table in a friend’s house and knew that I needed to have one, too. This one is beautifully made and at an unbelievably great price.
customer_reviews.author: cbd

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the real thing! Super clean and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible stylish, durable, bench that looks exactly like the real thing. I bought one of this some time ago, and have been so pleased with it that I bought another a couple months later.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Ljung

customer_reviews.title: Poly/bark slat 5’ walnut bench. Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Poly and bark slat 5’ bench in walnut George Nelson. This is the third one I’ve bought. Two for my sister, one for me. Good price. Looks really nice. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Santos

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Has a great modern
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Has a great modern, clean line look. Placed it in front of our king size bed. Just be careful, if you sit on the end, it tips over!
customer_reviews.author: Austin Tuxedo Cat

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged nicely, was easy to assemble, and looks and performs well. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Swells

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench
customer_reviews.text: Looks modern and clean. Very comfortable too. Only drawback is if you sit at the edge alone it will tip over.
customer_reviews.author: happy buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Have always wanted a Nelson bench, and this fit the budget. Well-made and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine2

customer_reviews.title: A+++++
customer_reviews.text: It's SOOO good you guys! I don't normally post reviews but I have to give credit here, I absolutely love this bench. It looks like the real Herman Miller slat bench and is nice and heavy. Easy to set up, quick delivery, looks great in our living room. TEN STARS!
customer_reviews.author: Jojojojo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! The same Nelson Bench cost 2,100.00 dollars from another website. Same quality. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: oh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bench very well made would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble, very sturdy, and looks gorgeous. Currently using mine as a coffee table!
customer_reviews.author: Raamin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, looks fantastic, great finish with solid quality wood. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: AntheaMcQuoid

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Not hard at all to put together and it looks really nice if your wanting that mid century look without paying a crazy price
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble. Very stylish coffee table or bench.
customer_reviews.author: Hydro man

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chair for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Nicely built. I use this as a bench near the window and my cats love it! I needed something that sits lower so this was perfect. Nice mid-century look.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: came packed well - quality is good - color to me is NOT a walnut look ...
customer_reviews.text: came packed well - quality is good - color to me is NOT a walnut look it is more orange then a nice warm walnut - we did not put it together put it right back into the box - not the color shown on line
customer_reviews.author: David G Bruner

customer_reviews.title: I think even Mr. Nelson would’ve approved.
customer_reviews.text: If like me you crave these modern classics- but can’t possibly afford them- this bench is for you. Solid construction, straightforward assembly make this a great purchase. So happy. If only I could find an egg chair Mr. Jacobson would approve of!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Looks like used to me
customer_reviews.text: The corner is broken, a lot of scratches on one piece of wood. There is even a tape (got painted black) on one of the screw holes. Looks like used to me. The legs are slightly uneven, shakes a little bit on the wood floor, but is ok when but on rug.
customer_reviews.author: Qi Guo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bench!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful bench!!!! I love it. Was just a Little disappointed in the pumped corner die to very poor packaging. See picture below.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Jacoby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super fast delivery and great product!!! I'm so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Grace K.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! My wife worked for Herman Miller so we ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! My wife worked for Herman Miller so we have a lot of originals & were hesitant to buy a "replica" for our basement. Happy we did, happy we didn't spend 1K on an original, and happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Darragh Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Bench fell apart, cannot reach seller
customer_reviews.text: We bought a few of these for work and one fell apart. We tried to reach the seller and no replies. We have only had them for 5 months. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Ken H.

customer_reviews.title: Overall good, but some quality control issues.
customer_reviews.text: It came in great condition compared to some others who have ordered. The wood light and matches my cabinets well. Fits perfectly in the little nook where I placed it. The packaging was beat up and had holes in it, so I was lucky nothing was damaged. My only complaint is that there is black sharpie marks on the inside of the bench as seen in the second attached photo.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice bench, came with scratches,not enough for me to go thru hassle of exchange
customer_reviews.author: QT

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking but I question its sturdiness. Don't sit on either end or you hear some cracking.
customer_reviews.author: Jaaron Williams

customer_reviews.title: This bench looks even better then in the photos
customer_reviews.text: This bench looks even better then in the photos. Assembly required nothing that wasn't supplied, and took less then 5 minutes. This company supplied a product as good as or better then described. I would not hesitate to purchase their products in the future...very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael   Reynolds

product_meta.title: Poly and Bark Slat 5' Bench in Walnut
product_meta.description: Color:WalnutVersatile, stylish and always on trend, the George Nelson Platform Style Bench 5' is a true chameleon of furniture design. From anything to a seat or coffee table, all the way to an occasional piece, its simple construction allows it to blend seamlessly into even the busiest of spaces without outshining your current decor. One of the founders of the American Modernist movement, George Nelson's designs are considered to be some of the most iconic and significant in furniture history. Along with his associates, he worked with almost all of the major designers of the era. Sturdy and hard wearing, the frame is crafted birch with a rubber wood top and comes in a Natural or Walnut and black combo that's always in style.
feature_bullets: Solid Wood Legs. Weight Capacity-350 pounds

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars82 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
